data.title: National Housing Authority
data.text:
The National Housing Authority (NHA) demonstrated its unwavering commitment to public service by actively participating in the Bagong Pilipinas Serbisyo Fair (BPSF) Agency Summit held at the Philippine International Convention Center (PICC) on August 19-21, 2024. Under the leadership of NHA General Manager Joeben Tai, the agency’s delegation was led by Assistant General Manager Alvin continue reading : NHA PARTICIPATES IN BPSF AGENCY SUMMIT

As part of its commitment to gender equality, the National Housing Authority (NHA) organized a five-day Gender and Development (GAD) Pool of Trainer’s Training for its select officers and employees held at the NHA Main Office in Quezon City on August 12-16, 2024. Under the leadership of NHA General Manager Joeben Tai, the activity was continue reading : NHA: COMMITTED TO GENDER SENSITIVE COMMUNITIES

More than 1,838 beneficiaries attended the National Housing Authority’s (NHA) People’s Caravan: Serbisyong Serbisyong Dala ay Pag-asa that was recently held at Northville 14 Resettlement Site, Brgy. Calulut, City of San Fernando, Pampanga. Under the management of NHA General Manager Joeben A. Tai, the agency aims to uplift the lives of beneficiaries through the delivery continue reading : MORE THAN 1,838 BENEFICIARIES FROM PAMPANGA JOINS NHA PEOPLE’S CARAVAN

The National Housing Authority (NHA), headed by General Manager Joeben Tai, marked the celebration of National Indigenous Peoples (IP) Day by reaffirming its commitment to improving the lives of IPs nationwide, highlighting its efforts in providing culturally sensitive shelter to various ethnic groups. To date, under its Housing Assistance Program for Indigenous Peoples (HAPIP), the continue reading : NHA MARKS NATIONAL IP DAY; EMPOWERS ETHNIC GROUPS
